nodes.text: Temperance was a town located on the planet Nyriaan.

Temperance was established near the native settlement Starveil, by offworld traders. While the town was not an immediate commercial success, the natives used lots of scavenged and dated technology, and eventually began to visit Temperance to obtain weapons and spare parts. Many merchants initially offered low-quality products to the natives, but the natives made a point of taking to task any merchants who sold them defective goods.
The Temperance Arena was established on the outskirts of the town and hosted weekly gladiatorial fights.
